entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}were locked inside a room...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}were locked inside a room...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,195001}Hmph. No sooner do we meet someone{F801}who can give us answers than we're{F801}locked up.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,195001}Hmph. No sooner do we meet someone{F801}who can give us answers than we're{F801}locked up.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,195002}It was clear by their faces that they{F801}recognized our Gauntlets...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,195002}It was clear by their faces that they{F801}recognized our Gauntlets...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195003}...You alive? You're alive, right?{F801}Hee hee hee...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195004}Okay, tell me: Where did you get those{F801}Demonicas?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195003}...You alive? You're alive, right?{F801}Hee hee hee...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195004}Okay, tell me: Where did you get those{F801}Demonicas?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195006}Oh sorry. Would it be easier to{F801}understand if I said "Demon Summoning{F801}Program"?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195007}We scoured all of Tokyo for them.{F801}I didn't think there were any left!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195006}Oh sorry. Would it be easier to{F801}understand if I said "Demon Summoning{F801}Program"?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195007}We scoured all of Tokyo for them.{F801}I didn't think there were any left!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195009}Hey, show me your Demon Summoning{F801}Program and I'll let you out, OK?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195009}Hey, show me your Demon Summoning{F801}Program and I'll let you out, OK?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195011}Come on! Don't be so stingy.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195012}I'll come in to see it, then.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Simplehearted voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,195011}Come on! Don't be so stingy.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195012}I'll come in to see it, then.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195013}Kiyoharu, it's dangerous to get too{F801}close.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195013}Kiyoharu, it's dangerous to get too{F801}close.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195014}...It IS! It's really a Demon{F801}Summoning Program!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195014}...It IS! It's really a Demon{F801}Summoning Program!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195016}Kiyoharu? What should we do with{F801}them...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195016}Kiyoharu? What should we do with{F801}them...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195017}Why, they're my dear guests! You need{F801}to let them go, of course.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195017}Why, they're my dear guests! You need{F801}to let them go, of course.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195018}Ooooh, I haven't been this excited{F801}since I first saw the angels!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195019}I should tell Akira!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195018}Ooooh, I haven't been this excited{F801}since I first saw the angels!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,195019}I should tell Akira!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195020}Ummm... Well, you're free to walk{F801}around.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Armed man\0{F87A,99}{F813,0,195020}Ummm... Well, you're free to walk{F801}around.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195015}Ahahahaaaha! Finally, our prayers have{F801}been answered! Hee hee!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Kiyoharu\0{F87A,83}{F813,0,195015}Ahahahaaaha! Finally, our prayers have{F801}been answered! Hee hee!{F801}
